extendedInfo.description: Fun multiplayer toddler card matching game filled with animal images and sounds.Welcome to the BingAnimal jungle! With realistic animal sounds and characters, children will develop important motor and memory skills while learning and having a great time. Discover animals and their sounds with this fun and educational matching game.In single player mode, your children will rescue 16 animals traveling from the sea environment to the tropical jungle.  Two player mode makes the experience ideal for the whole family, so parents and children can play together. In addition, parents can track their childrenâs learning through YogiPlayâs parental interface and receive custom educational game recommendations from leading educators.  All the recommendations are age-specific and reviewed by early childhood educators led by ex-LeapFrog learning experts.  YogiPlay recommendations are also  organized by skill area so you can find the right app for your unique child:â¢	Literacyâ¢	Art & Musicâ¢	Mathematicsâ¢	Physical Developmentâ¢	Learning for lifeâ¢	EntertainmentJoin the leading education network on tablets and smartphones to discover more applications that are age appropriateFeatures & BenefitsDevelops motor & memory skills- Enhances social skills (play with friends and family)- Keeps children entertained- Fun animal sounds!- YogiPlay enhancedAnimals:Sea Animals: Seal, Penguin, Whale, DolphinHome Animals: Cat, Dog, Mouse, Birds, MosquitoFarm Animals: Pigs, Duck, Cow, Donkey, Horse, Rooster, Chick, Goat, GooseJungle Animals: Bear, Owl, Bat, Eagle, Tiger, Dinosaur, Monkey, Lion, Camel, Snake, ElephantQuotes:âThis is a good alternative to angry birds for my toddlers as it is educationalâ: Mom of threeâWe have 3 kids (8, 4, 3) and they love this. The game is completely addicting.â

reviews.title: I can play with my kids!!!
reviews.comment: This is one of the first apps that lets me really play with my kid!  I love it :-)  (and so do my kids when I let them win ;p)  Great suite by Decamages!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Entertains my daughter
reviews.comment: Great app! Provides hours of entertainment for my daughter. The YogiPlay tie-in is neat as it allows you to track your child\'s progress over time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
reviews.comment: The children (aged 3 and 5) that I nanny for absolutely love playing this game! It not only enhances their memory skills, but helps them learn about sportsmanship and that they don\'t get to win all the time. This app works really well in the car and helps ease long drives. In addition, it is quite fun to compete against adult friends using this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Totally cool for the kids
reviews.comment: My daughter loves it. This is really a cool app and game. Not only very well designed in a way that the graphics and the sounds captivate her attention immediately, but the game is very educational. Definitely a must download on your Android. I have used it on the way to and from Tahoe, very nice to help kids to cope with long travels. Tiger character is awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninterested
reviews.comment: My 3 year old found this game boring...he has more fun playing angry birds
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for toddlers!
reviews.comment: I have two kids, 3 and 5 years old. I downloaded BingAnimal and they started playing with it right away. They were interested in the animal images and sounds. What I liked the most was how they actually wanted to play together (as opposed to fighting for the phone!) when they discovered the two-player mode. I totally recommend BingAnimal as an educational, social development and fun app for little kids!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: This game doesnt even earn a star! My kid hates it! Thanks for disappointing her.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 10
reviews.comment: Very small on screen - not optimized for large display, too hard on eyes to distinguish animals.
reviews.author: Stephanie Silvia

reviews.title: Incompatible
reviews.comment: Pls fix this for galaxy s 3
reviews.author: A Google User
